meta.sourceNotes: Guided by Faith Javane & Dusty Bunker's Divine Triangle; Expression 7 emphasizes analysis, solitude, truth-testing, and spiritual inquiry.
meta.generationGuidelines: Focus on precise language, research discipline, pattern recognition, and the way quiet insight becomes reliable guidance.

profiles.coreEssence: Expression Number 7 communicates through clarity, inquiry, and distilled truth—preferring signal over noise and depth over display.
profiles.lifeLesson: Share the gold you mine. Your work is to bring solitude-born wisdom back to the village in words people can use.
profiles.shadowSignature: Withholding, cynicism, and superiority cloaked as 'standards.' Antidote: generous explanation, plain language, and scheduled openness.

physical.notes: Economy of motion; calm, minimal gestures that steady a room.

mental.notes: Analytical precision; excels at pattern analysis, logic, and synthesis.

emotional.notes: Feelings run private; trust deepens when emotions are named carefully.

intuitive.notes: Strong inner radar; insights arrive in silence and nature.

decisionMaking.text: Define the question precisely; half of a 7’s decision lives in the prompt.
Set evidence thresholds and a time limit; decide when the clock or data is met.
List first principles and test options against them.
Prefer small controlled trials over big, belief-driven bets.
Write a one-page brief: question, method, data, call.
Name assumptions and plan a quick falsification step.
Weight long-term truth over short-term optics.
Invite a non-expert to sanity-check plain-language takeaways.
Choose the option that increases clarity and reduces unknowns.
When tied, pick the path that teaches the most with least downside.
Publish the rationale; transparency sharpens thinking.
Schedule a post-decision review to refine the method.

stressResponse.text: Under stress you withdraw; set a timer for solitude then return with a summary and a request.
Counter spirals by naming one fact, one feeling, one next experiment.
Short nature breaks reboot your signal-to-noise ratio.
Switch from critique to curiosity—ask one good question.
Trim inputs; mute channels until the nervous system settles.
Move the body to unlock thought; walking sharpens your logic.
Use neutral tone; scorched-earth precision damages trust.
Draft, sleep, then edit—time is your best de-escalator.
If you feel superior, practice stating what you admire first.
Share the uncertainty explicitly; honesty calms speculation.
Ask for data support rather than carrying the analysis alone.
End tense exchanges with a recap of agreements and open questions.

communication.text: Speak in clean lines—define terms, show evidence, and state the bottom line.
Use metaphors from nature and craft to make nuance accessible.
Ask calibration questions to ensure shared definitions.
Show your method briefly so others can trust your findings.
Prefer written summaries; precision thrives on the page.
Slow your pace; give listeners time to process complexity.
Credit sources and uncertainty ranges to model intellectual honesty.
Translate expert talk into everyday language without condescension.
Invite counterexamples explicitly to strengthen conclusions.
Use headings and bullets sparingly to preserve structure.
Close with practical implications: what to do now, next, never.
Record a short Loom/voice note for those who learn by ear.

relationships.text: Name your need for solitude and set predictable windows so connection feels safe.
Share inner life in drafts—one thought, one feeling, one question.
Practice curiosity about your partner’s worldview; compare maps, not egos.
Offer feedback privately and precisely with examples.
Balance analysis with affection; warmth is data, too.
Schedule adventures that feed awe: museums, nature, night skies.
When hurt, describe impact before offering theories about motives.
Use shared reading or learning as a bond-builder.
Create tech-light time; silence together grows trust.
Let others be messy; not everything needs optimizing.
Share your questions, not just your conclusions.
Celebrate your partner’s truths even when they differ from yours.

productivity.text: Protect deep work with long, quiet blocks; quality beats quantity for 7s.
Define 'done' as a clear insight or artifact: memo, model, checklist.
Batch shallow work to keep cognitive gears from grinding.
Start with literature scan or prior art to avoid reinventing.
Use hypothesis → test → result logs to track progress.
Automate data collection so attention stays on meaning.
Time-box research phases and reserve a separate synthesis session.
Pair with a shipper personality to move insights into action.
Archive sources with citations; future you will thank you.
Run peer reviews with checklists to keep feedback objective.
Teach what you just solved to cement the learning.
End weeks with a findings digest and next questions.

financial.text: Decide money matters with data and values—numbers plus meaning.
Prefer boring, robust systems over flashy bets; compound wisdom, not thrills.
Price expertise by outcomes and depth, not verbosity.
Negotiate calmly with pre-written criteria and BATNAs.
Automate savings; decision fatigue erodes discipline.
Track spending categories to observe patterns without shame.
Document assumptions behind financial plans and revisit annually.
Avoid debt justified by 'learning' that you won’t use.
Fund tools and training that raise the quality of insight.
Keep emergency and opportunity funds—both reduce fear bias.
State financial boundaries in collaborations up front.
Teach basic numeracy to loved ones; shared clarity reduces stress.

creative.text: Let rigor be elegant—minimalist forms, exact words, and honest lines.
Create from inquiry: start with a question only your craft can answer.
Build motif libraries—symbols, maps, formulas—to reuse with integrity.
Publish annotated works: show sources and thinking trails.
Use silence, space, and negative capability as design tools.
Collaborate with editors who prize clarity over glitter.
Keep versions; iteration is a record of honesty.
Let nature’s geometries inform composition and rhythm.
Write in plain style first; ornament only if it serves meaning.
Host critique circles with rules that separate taste from craft.
Teach your method to turn solitude into shared technique.
Archive failed experiments; they are future footnotes.

learning.text: Study in depth blocks with retrieval practice; precision loves repetition.
Prefer primary sources, standards, and data over takes.
Write summaries in your own words to test comprehension.
Build small prototypes to force clarity of understanding.
Teach-back sessions reveal gaps faster than rereading.
Alternate solitary study with peer seminars for cross-checks.
Track unanswered questions; curiosity maps direct the next sprint.
Limit courses; finish with an artifact that proves learning.
Use error logs to convert mistakes into method upgrades.
Index your notes; retrieval beats collection.
Protect cognitive freshness—sleep and sunlight are study tools.
Calibrate skepticism: test claims, don’t torch relationships.

wellness.text: Treat the body as a research partner—track inputs and results, then iterate.
Balance solitude with belonging; schedule both on purpose.
Choose steady, contemplative movement—walking, swimming, yoga.
Protect sleep; clarity degrades quickly without it.
Use nature time as medicine; awe widens perspective.
Practice simple emotional labeling to keep the system honest.
Eat for stable focus—fiber, protein, and hydration.
Limit stimulants when doing deep analysis to avoid jittery logic.
Keep screens out of late nights; blue light blurs insight.
Share health info with one trusted partner for accountability.
Adopt micro-breaks; the best ideas often appear after stepping away.
Celebrate quiet wins—consistency, clarity, and kindness to self.

spiritual.text: Seek truth by testing it; contemplation and experiment are both devotion.
Create simple rituals that foreground silence and sincerity.
Let humility round your sharp edges—credit Source and teachers.
Translate mystical moments into practical ethics and service.
Use questions as prayers; clarity arrives in honest asking.
Walk, breathe, and listen; nature is your quiet cathedral.
Study texts across traditions to triangulate the real from the fashionable.
Share insights with tenderness; precision can be gentle.
Fast from noise periodically to reset receptivity.
Practice gratitude for the unseen helpers and the data alike.
Hold paradox without panic; mystery doesn’t negate truth.
End sessions by writing one actionable way to live the insight.

shadow.text: When superiority creeps in, name what you respect in others before offering critique.
Trade secrecy for staged transparency—share drafts, not just perfect proofs.
Notice when 'just asking questions' hides contempt; return to sincere curiosity.
Stop moving goalposts; define enough evidence before you start.
Let feelings be data; ignoring them skews conclusions.
Avoid weaponizing facts; use truth to heal, not win.
Release perfection by publishing iteration histories.
Invite mentorship when distrust narrows your world.
Reduce sarcasm; choose simple kindness over clever barbs.
Don’t retreat after conflict; schedule a repair conversation.
When isolation tempts, commit to one shared meal or walk.
Balance skepticism with wonder; both are forms of respect.

transitions.text: Plan change with a research lens—hypotheses, checkpoints, and reflection notes.
Tell a simple story for others: why this, why now, what it means.
Carry one anchor ritual (walk, prayer, reading) through the shift.
Map risks and learning goals; pick paths that grow your wisdom.
Archive the old chapter with gratitude and data about what worked.
Set social minimums during transitions to avoid isolation.
Use checklists to reduce cognitive load when everything moves.
Keep decisions in writing to avoid revisionist memory.
Invite feedback on the process to improve your change method.
Schedule decompression after big pushes; clarity needs rest.
Share early signals and adjust openly to build trust.
Close with a public summary of lessons—service completes the arc.

trinity.integration_notes: Expression 7 manifests Life Path and Soul Urge through inquiry, analysis, and the return of wisdom to community—truth tested, then taught.
trinity.calculation: Sum the numbers of all letters in the full birth name; reduce to a single digit or master number (11, 22, 33, 44).
trinity.relationship_to_life_path: Life Path is the path; Expression 7 surveys the terrain, charts the contours, and names the true landmarks.
trinity.relationship_to_soul_urge: Soul Urge is the inner call; Expression 7 answers by seeking and articulating what is real.
behavioral_integration: Expression filters how Life Path lessons are investigated and verified.
Expression channels Soul Urge desires into disciplined learning and clear explanation.
Alignment yields humble authority—evidence with empathy.
Tensions show up as withdrawal or perfection stalls; scheduled sharing restores flow.
Service lens: translate solitude-born insights into practical guidance others can trust.

core_principles: Describe HOW analysis, inquiry, and quiet authority express outwardly.
Keep guidance specific: definitions, methods, artifacts, and sharing rhythms.
Favor plain language and kindness over cleverness.
Honor both data and mystery without letting either bully the other.
Include verbal and non-verbal cues that communicate steadiness and precision.
behavioral_insights: Use intensity 0.6–0.9 where tendencies are strongest; add triggers/supports/challenges on high-impact items.
Each insight is 1–2 sentences with observable actions and outputs.
Maintain 12 categories × 12 insights for ingestion consistency.
Avoid medical/financial absolutes; stick to behaviors and methods.
Write for real-time coaching prompts and long-form training alike.
divine_triangle_alignment: Expression derives from the full birth name numerology.
It represents talents, abilities, and communication style manifested outwardly.
It bridges inner motive (Soul Urge) and life curriculum (Life Path).
Growth arc moves from guarded brilliance to generous, teachable wisdom.
Service lens: rigorous, kind truth-telling that improves lives.
categories_to_include: relationships - How they express in connection
productivity - How they express through work
financial - How they express value and abundance
learning - How they express curiosity and growth
spiritual - How they express divine connection
transitions - How expression evolves through change
